title: Dataset caching broken on windows (or tests)
body:
This functionality is a fairly recent addition: https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/4608

However, its tests are broken on windows, hence we should assume that the actual functionality is also not function on windows.

```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.tests.test_utils_cached_dataset.test_cached_dataset
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\mih\miniconda3\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 180, in _wrap_skip_if_no_network
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 755, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\test_utils_cached_dataset.py", line 247, in test_cached_dataset
    second_dspath, second_repopath = decorated_test2()
  File "C:\Users\mih\miniconda3\lib\site-packages\wrapt\wrappers.py", line 566, in __call__
    return self._self_wrapper(self.__wrapped__, self._self_instance,
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\utils.py", line 996, in intermediator
    return to_be_wrapper(*args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 755, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils_cached_dataset.py", line 184, in _wrap_cached_dataset
    return f(*(arg[:-1] + (clone_ds,)), **kw)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\test_utils_cached_dataset.py", line 197, in decorated_test2
    assert_in(here, where)
AssertionError: '40334d1c-d520-4b33-a620-4f7daf8a1d23' not found in []

======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.tests.test_utils_cached_dataset.test_cached_url
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\mih\miniconda3\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 180, in _wrap_skip_if_no_network
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 755, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\test_utils_cached_dataset.py", line 294, in test_cached_url
    decorated_test2()
  File "C:\Users\mih\miniconda3\lib\site-packages\wrapt\wrappers.py", line 566, in __call__
    return self._self_wrapper(self.__wrapped__, self._self_instance,
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\utils.py", line 996, in intermediator
    return to_be_wrapper(*args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils_cached_dataset.py", line 236, in _wrap_cached_url
    return f(*(arg + (new_url,)), **kw)
  File "C:\Users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\test_utils_cached_dataset.py", line 292, in decorated_test2
    assert_true(origin.repo.file_has_content(str(annexed_file)))
AssertionError: False is not true
```
